001package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.annotation;
002
003import java.lang.annotation.ElementType;
004import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
005import java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy;
006import java.lang.annotation.Target;
007import org.springframework.context.annotation.Lazy;
008import org.springframework.context.annotation.Scope;
009import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
010
011/**
012 * Marks a test service as a Spring-managed component with a prototype scope.
013 *
014 * <p>This annotation is used to define test-related services that should be managed by Spring.
015 * It combines {@code @Service}, {@code @Scope("prototype")}, and {@code @Lazy}, ensuring that
016 * each test service instance is created on demand and is not shared across the test lifecycle.
017 *
018 * <p>The {@code value} attribute allows specifying the type of service (e.g., "API", "DB", "UI"),
019 * which can be useful for categorization or retrieval in the test framework.
020 *
021 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
022 */
023@Target(ElementType.TYPE)
024@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
025@Service
026@Scope("prototype")
027@Lazy
028public @interface Ring {
029
030   /**
031    * Specifies the type or category of the test service.
032    *
033    * <p>This value can be used for identification or configuration within the test framework.
034    *
035    * @return The name of the test service category.
036    */
037   String value();
038}
